A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'll need to see it again so the novelty wears off before I can say whether this is my favorite Star Wars movie or just top 3\, but I loved it.\n\nAdam Driver is totally compelling\, and as likable as an evil fanatic can be. Strong performances by Carrie Fisher and Mark Hamill remind me how wonderful the original films were\, but also add strength and depth to the new stories. Aesthetically lovely and intimidating\, and philosophically challenging\, TLJ captures much of the essence of The Empire Strikes Back without falling into the derivative mold of The Force Awakens.
